item.description:
Thursday nights just got a lot better with the addition of football. So if you're looking for a place to catch the game, sample some brews or get dinner, come down to the English Cellar Alehouse on Thursday.The game will feature the execrable Giants facing a surging Carolina team.

If you haven't been there before, it's Providence's faux British pub with a huge beer list and a tardis looking phonebooth to boot.

Come on down, grab a few drinks and meet some people. It should be a great venue to chat about Fantasy Football strategies or whatever else comes up.

If this is your first meetup, it should be a great way to meet new people.

See you on Thursday.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us, we should be easy to find
item.name: Thursday Night Football@ English Cellar Ale House
